SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: RESIDENTIAL SERVICES CARE, ASSISTED LIVING AND SKILLED NURSING CARE FOR THE ELDERLY PROVIDED THROUGH OUR LIFE CARE COMMUNITY WITH 67 RESIDENTIAL APARTMENTS, 20 ASSISTED LIVING UNITS AND A 32 BED SKILLED NURSING FACILITY. REHABILITATION, MEDICATION MANAGEMENT AND OTHER SKILLED NURSING SERVICES PROVIDED. PARTIAL SCHOLARSHIPS ARE PROVIDED TO 20% TO 25% OF THE RESIDENTS WHO ARE UNABLE TO PAY THE MONTHLY CARE FEE IN FULL. FINANCIAL SUPPORT IS PROVIDED TO ANY RESIDENT OUTLIVING THEIR FINANCIAL RESOURCES.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description2Txt: OVER 18,000 MEALS PER MONTH ARE PREPARED FOR DISTRIBUTION THROUGH HOME DELIVERY OR TO LOW-INCOME SENIOR MEAL SITES IN SAN FRANCISCO. [PROGRAM TERMINATED JUNE 30, 2015.]

RlnOfActyToAccomOfExmptPrpsGrp.RelationshipStatementTxt: REVENUE IS COLLECTED FROM RESIDENTS FOR THE PROVISION OF RESIDENTIAL SERVICES, ASSISTED LIVING, SKILLED NURSING CARE, REHABILITATION SERVICES, MEDICATION MANAGEMENT AND OTHER NURSING AND HEALTH CARE SERVICES.

REVENUE IS ALSO COLLECTED FROM SELF-HELP FOR THE ELDERLY, A 501(C)(3) ORGANIZATION, TO OFFSET THE MEAL PREPARATION COST FOR THE PROVISION OF MEALS DELIVERED TO MEAL SITES SERVING LOW-INCOME SENIOR CITIZENS. [PROGRAM TERMINATED JUNE 30, 2015.]

OtherDecreasesDetail.Desc: UNREALIZED LOSS ON SECURITIES CARRIED AT FMV
